description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget screen for managing locations and time slots within a manager flow of a health meal ordering platform. It includes UI components such as app bar, headers, and placeholder list items, with access control based on user roles.

classes.name: ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen
classes.description: StatelessWidget representing the locations and time slots management screen with role-based access control.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: Private StatelessWidget for rendering the header section with styled gradient and icon.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: Private StatelessWidget for displaying a styled row with icon and text for placeholders.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for rendering the widget tree based on user authorization.

methods.name: _SectionHeader.build
methods.description: Build method creating the styled header UI component.

methods.name: _Row.build
methods.description: Build method creating a row with icon and text.
